name: Mystery Souls 2: Left Behind
description:
SYPNOSIS

A father has got a job in a circus. The circus was not very popular but it paid quite well, so it was a perfect job opportunity. Without missing this opportunity, you will have to take care of some creatures from the circus that are prowling around the site every night with the aim of filling some gasoline tanks. Each creature has its own mechanics. Pay attention to each creature at all times as you solve the mystery of Anny and the circus.

FEATURES

  • 6 Monsters.
  • Voice acting.
  • 3 Endings.
  • Conversations.
  • English & Spanish.
  • Gamejolt API Support (Win trophies, make a new record).
  • Better Infinite Mode.
  • Custom Mode.
  • And more...

CREDITS

  • Story | SuzuGames
  • Jumpscares | Ena Tachibana
  • Sounds And Music | Akuzan, FreeSounds
  • Voices | Mbk_126 (Elecbot), Winston Third (Crelar), Wandering Voice (Skelat)
  • Code | Mr. Trivel
  • Testers | Akuzan
